description: Explore the pioneering efforts of Arbitrum in decentralized decision-making through community governance and Ethereum scaling using Layer 2 solutions with optimistic rollups. Learn about Arbitrum's governance structure, delegated voting, transparency, and community initiatives.
keywords: Arbitrum, decentralized governance, Ethereum scaling, Layer 2 solutions, optimistic rollups, community initiatives, delegated voting, blockchain transparency
title: Arbitrum and Community Governance: Pioneering Decentralized Decision-Making
